events.content:
# Welcoming Remarks and Overview of Program
§ Sandy Pentland, Dazza Greenwood & Jonathan Askin (25 minutes on setting the context and a 'big picture' view on law, technology, big data, social physics)
§ Ellen Suni (10 minutes 'big picture' on innovation in legal education, law tech in public policy and access to justice)
§ Evan Absher and Tony Luppino (10 minutes on the genesis and current posture of GLTL)

## John Cummins (20 minutes)
* Principles and operation of GLTL, objectives of today and tomorrow)
